mpicxx  -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wfatal-errors -Wall -Wextra -g -Wall -Wextra -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fsanitize=address,undefined CMakeFiles/phdf5_example.dir/main.cpp.o -o phdf5_example  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/openmpi -ladios2_cxx11_mpi -ladios2_cxx11 -ladios2_c_mpi -ladios2_c /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/openmpi/libhdf5.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcrypto.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcurl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libsz.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libz.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.a -lm
